short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows for sorting of Poshmark Closet based on color.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Poshlor is your ultimate closet sorting assistant for Poshmark enthusiasts. Revolutionize the way you manage your Poshmark closet with this powerful Chrome extension.

Effortlessly organize your listings by color with just a click. Poshlor intelligently categorizes your items based on their color, allowing you to present your closet in a visually appealing and organized manner.

Key Features:

• Automatic Color Sorting: Instantly categorize your items by color, saving you valuable time and effort.
• Faster Than Manual Sorting: Slash your sorting time significantly compared to manual methods, thanks to Poshlor's lightning-fast automation.
• Custom Sorting Options: Choose from various sorting options, including classic color schemes and custom arrangements, to suit your unique preferences.
• User Dashboard: Keep track of how many shares you've done on your way to Poshmark success!

----------------------------------------

Version 2.2 (Jul 3, 2024)

New Features:

• Added beta authentication service to allows users with a valid beta key access to Poshlor.
• Revamped UI/UX of entire chrome extension for improved aesthetics and usability.
• Introduced additional color options, allowing users to customize their experience further.
• Streamlined sorting algorithms for faster and more efficient performance.
• Added user dashboard which shows stats about # of shares, as well as a live activity log.

Enhancements:

• Made sharing algorithm more random to avoid bot detection.
• Implemented informative notifications to alert users about important events such as invalid token input and completion of sorting tasks.

Bug Fixes:

• Fixed a bug related to sorting sold items, ensuring accurate sorting results.
• Addressed an issue with counting total items in a user's closet, ensuring correct item counts are displayed.

----------------------------------------
